help.name: Password Administration
help.description: This action is an ARS utility, designed to encrypt or to decrypt AR configuration keys and passwords. Please notice that this action needs connection to the server that manages that key or password.

option.description: Execution mode or this action (encrypt or decrypt keys and passwords)
Key or password that will be applied to encryption or decryption procedure

sample.description: Encrypt 'test' string in ARSystem format to become a classic AR password

sample.code: areasy -action passadmin -operation encrypt -password test -arserver ars1 -aruser Demo
sample.description: Encrypt 'test' string in ARSystem format to become a classic AR password but with explicit connection to a particular ARS server (and not relaying on the connection details defined in general runtime configuration)
